name: Moltiplicube
description:
Moltiplicube is a 2D puzzle game that tests your brain's spatial reasoning and prediction capabilities. 

You play as M-155, a test subject that became a mutant capable of multiplying himself. This skill will serve him well as you accompany him getting through the still bright abandoned lab muliplyng himself to get through enigmatic and uncompromising puzzles to reach the long-dreamed exit.

Note: I didn't include many screenshots for no spoilers ;)
